title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 11 data points.
Overall Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2005 to 2015.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Max Revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 6.32 was recorded at Year 2012
Min Revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 4.7 was recorded at Year 2009
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2012 to 2015.
Differently, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009 to 2012.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2007 to 2009.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2005 to 2007.
